classic.name: Hungarian Parliament Building
classic.description: Landmark Gothic Revival–style edifice with lavishly decorated rooms, plus a visitors' center.

classic.name: Fisherman's Bastion
classic.description: 19th-century fortress with 7 turreted lookout towers offering panoramic views plus cafe on terrace.

classic.name: Müpa Budapest
classic.description: State-of-the-art cultural hub, known as the Palace of Arts, with a theater, concert hall and museum.

classic.name: Elizabeth Lookout
classic.description: Constructed in 1911, this landmark limestone tower offers a cafe & steps to sweeping views.

classic.name: St. Stephen's Basilica
classic.description: Vast cupola-topped Roman Catholic place of worship, built from 1851 to 1905, with regular concerts.

classic.name: Buda Castle
classic.description: Palatial venue for the Hungarian National Gallery plus displays from Gothic altars to sculpture.

classic.name: Heroes' Square
classic.description: Part of a UNESCO World Heritage site, with statues of the leaders of 7 tribes who founded Hungary.

classic.name: Shoes on the Danube Bank
classic.description: Waterside shoe sculptures memorializing those killed at the river by a fascist party during WWII.

classic.name: Hungarian State Opera
classic.description: Neoclassical venue with ceiling frescoes & statues of composers, for opera & ballet plus tours.

classic.name: Vajdahunyad Castle
classic.description: This 1896 lakeside castle shows the evolution of Hungarian architecture in its elaborate design.

foodie.name: Artizán Bakery
foodie.description: Artisanal breads & pastries served in a laid-back cafe with understated decor & a cozy vibe.

foodie.name: Ruin Bars Budapest
foodie.description: Collection of bars in an abandoned building with graffiti & plants, drawing an international crowd.

foodie.name: Retro Lángos Budapest
foodie.description: Walk-up joint with outdoor seating, serving up sizable Hungarian lángos with a variety of toppings.

foodie.name: Déryné
foodie.description: 2-floor brasserie for Hungarian/French dishes, with garden, in-house bakery & pianist playing daily.

foodie.name: Twentysix Budapest Restaurant
foodie.description: Cool, plant-filled venue with a Mediterranean eatery, plus workshops & yoga classes.

adventure.name: Palvolgyi Cave
adventure.description: Cave with a 500-meter hiking trail that leads past stalactites & unusual rock formations.

adventure.name: Szemlő-hegyi Cave
adventure.description: Illuminated cave system known for its crystalline mineral deposits, offering guided tours.

adventure.name: Normafa Park
adventure.description: Elevated getaway providing hiking/biking paths, exercise equipment, wooded trails & panoramic views.

adventure.name: Gül Baba’s Tomb & Rosegarden
adventure.description: Octagonal 16th-century Ottoman tomb, restored as national monument, plus surrounding grounds.

adventure.name: Shoes on the Danube Bank
adventure.description: Waterside shoe sculptures memorializing those killed at the river by a fascist party during WWII.

adventure.name: City Park
adventure.description: Large park with a palm house, concert venues & museums, in addition to tree-filled paths & lawns.

adventure.name: Millenáris Park
adventure.description: Modern park with playgrounds, lawns & a hanging garden, plus the sleek National Dance Theatre.

adventure.name: Bikás park
adventure.description: Park with ball courts, a running track & outdoor gym equipment, plus a playground & pondside cafe.

adventure.name: Liberty Square
adventure.description: Quiet park with walking paths, monuments & play areas for kids, plus occasional festivals.

cultural.name: Müpa Budapest
cultural.description: State-of-the-art cultural hub, known as the Palace of Arts, with a theater, concert hall and museum.

cultural.name: Madách Színház
cultural.description: 800-seat venue for well-known international musicals, plus Hungarian works with English subtitles.

cultural.name: Budapest Operetta Theatre
cultural.description: Opera & Hungarian musicals in 900-seater venue, with 100-year-old chandelier, stucco & velvet walls.

cultural.name: Centrál Theater
cultural.description: Theater with main hall & studio stage, performing classic drama & well-known musicals in Hungarian.

cultural.name: Vajdahunyad Castle
cultural.description: This 1896 lakeside castle shows the evolution of Hungarian architecture in its elaborate design.

cultural.name: Museum of Fine Arts
cultural.description: Neoclassical art museum with an Egyptian collection, Renaissance frescoes & 19th-century paintings.
cultural.address: Budapest, Szépművészeti Múzeum, Dózsa György út 41, 1146 Hungary

cultural.name: Hungarian National Gallery
cultural.description: Permanent & temporary collections of Hungarian works from the 15th century to the modern day.

cultural.name: Massolit Budapest Books and Café
cultural.description: This cozy cafe with a garden offers coffee, tea & baked goods, along with English-language books.

cultural.name: Hungarian State Opera
cultural.description: Neoclassical venue with ceiling frescoes & statues of composers, for opera & ballet plus tours.

cultural.name: Vígszínház
cultural.description: Ornate late 19th-century venue, built by Fellner & Helmer, staging Hungarian drama & comedy.

relaxation.name: Normafa Park
relaxation.description: Elevated getaway providing hiking/biking paths, exercise equipment, wooded trails & panoramic views.

relaxation.name: Gül Baba’s Tomb & Rosegarden
relaxation.description: Octagonal 16th-century Ottoman tomb, restored as national monument, plus surrounding grounds.

relaxation.name: Four Seasons Hotel Gresham Palace Budapest
relaxation.description: Luxe hotel in an art nouveau-style building offering a brasserie, a day spa & an indoor pool.

relaxation.name: Shoes on the Danube Bank
relaxation.description: Waterside shoe sculptures memorializing those killed at the river by a fascist party during WWII.

relaxation.name: City Park
relaxation.description: Large park with a palm house, concert venues & museums, in addition to tree-filled paths & lawns.

relaxation.name: Millenáris Park
relaxation.description: Modern park with playgrounds, lawns & a hanging garden, plus the sleek National Dance Theatre.

relaxation.name: Kempinski Hotel Corvinus Budapest
relaxation.description: Upscale hotel with 2 chic restaurants & 3 bars, plus a spa, an indoor pool & a gym.

relaxation.name: ELTE Füvészkert
relaxation.description: Lush, historic garden founded in 1771 & showcasing an array of cacti, orchids & water lilies.

relaxation.name: Bikás park
relaxation.description: Park with ball courts, a running track & outdoor gym equipment, plus a playground & pondside cafe.

relaxation.name: Liberty Square
relaxation.description: Quiet park with walking paths, monuments & play areas for kids, plus occasional festivals.

nightlife.name: Budapest Operetta Theatre
nightlife.description: Opera & Hungarian musicals in 900-seater venue, with 100-year-old chandelier, stucco & velvet walls.

nightlife.name: Kempinski Hotel Corvinus Budapest
nightlife.description: Upscale hotel with 2 chic restaurants & 3 bars, plus a spa, an indoor pool & a gym.

nightlife.name: Szimpla Kert
nightlife.description: Huge pub with old mismatched items & a disused Trabant car, with music, food, market & a garden.

nightlife.name: Ruin Bars Budapest
nightlife.description: Collection of bars in an abandoned building with graffiti & plants, drawing an international crowd.

nightlife.name: Retro Lángos Budapest
nightlife.description: Walk-up joint with outdoor seating, serving up sizable Hungarian lángos with a variety of toppings.

nightlife.name: Papp László Budapest Sportaréna
nightlife.description: Named for Olympic boxer László Papp, this large indoor arena hosts concerts & athletic events.

nightlife.name: Ötkert
nightlife.description: Busy bar serving food plus big, informal club with DJs, live bands & open-air dance floor & terrace.

nightlife.name: Élesztő kézműves söröző
nightlife.description: Craft beers & traditional pub fare served in a trendy, warehouse-style venue that has a terrace.

trendy.name: Bestsellers
trendy.description: Indie, urban bookshop since 1992 supplying many English titles, plus movies, newspapers & magazines.

trendy.name: Gelarto Rosa
trendy.description: Relaxed dessert shop featuring rose-shaped ice creams & sorbets, plus seasonal flavors.

trendy.name: Massolit Budapest Books and Café
trendy.description: This cozy cafe with a garden offers coffee, tea & baked goods, along with English-language books.
